title: Inline JST Switch Kit
blurb:
JST switches and connectors provide an unobtrusive solution to power control. They are small so will fit comfortably in the chassis of an RC vehicle. This kit includes a JST switch with a male and female JST connector on each end attached to a 140mm wire. Great for hobby applications such as model trains, remote control helicopters and cars, or simple around the house projects that require discrete and simple switching.
Features:
Includes mounting bracket and screws
